Title: Raise the Titanic
Writer: Adam Kennedy (screenplay), Eric Hughes (adaptation), Clive Cussler (novel)
Actors: Jason Robards, Richard Jordan, David Selby, Anne Archer
Plot: A group of Americans are interested in raising the ill-fated Ocean liner Titanic. One of the team members finds out the Russians also have plans to raise the ship from its watery grave. Why all the interest ? A rare mineral on board could be used to power a sound beam that will knock any missile out of the air when entering us airspace.
